channel.title: Cant run java or run.bat or compi.bat
channel.description:
so i recentaly got a vps.
installed jdk.java 6_0_20
so when i go to run it all it does it does is opens a folder
when i do compile it
says
path is not specified or something
and inside it has 6_0_20
so idk

item.title: Cant run java or run.bat or compi.bat
item.dc:creator: @lil_wayne612 lil wayne612
item.description:
@lil_wayne612 wrote:

cant find any tuts on how to add enviormental varrryyy things…lol

Read full topic
item.source: Cant run java or run.bat or compi.bat

item.title: Cant run java or run.bat or compi.bat
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

Heres the correct code for it, it should work.

@echo off title Running Server cd ../src echo Compiling Now... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/codeusa/Engine.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: Cant run java or run.bat or compi.bat

item.title: Cant run java or run.bat or compi.bat
item.dc:creator: @travisabbott travisabbott
item.description:
@travisabbott wrote:

Did you do the CLASSPATH and PATH varibles?? you have to do them… look here on how to do them and make sure you change where it says jdk1.6.0_03 to jdk1.6.0_20 if you using the latest JDK update 6u20

hope i helped

Read full topic
